title: OS Level 10 â€” File Systems, Disk Scheduling & Protection
intro: This level introduces file systems, disk scheduling algorithms and basic protection/security concepts.
points: Define file, directory and file system.
Basic file operations: create, open, read, write, delete.
Concept of disk scheduling: FCFS, SSTF, SCAN, C-SCAN (just the idea).
Understand access control and protection (user, group, others; read/write/execute).
Basic idea of OS-level security mechanisms and user authentication.
